I found a FULL scan of the original of a short text by Yamamoto Kakuma, 
Yaeko's brother. Seems he lived on into the Meiji-- so it must've been 
another brother killed at Toba-Fushimi.

http://duels.doshisha.ac.jp:88/denshika/yamamoto/128/imgidx128.html

--M
